root: ^I'm going to take a Philosophy class and am trying to decide which one to take.

res1: ^The first day of class Professor Johnson assigns us a load of homework.
^Wow, first day of class and I got a load of homework. This is a bummer, my whole weekend is ruined. But there is a lot of interesting things assigned to us and I suppose I do learn a lot.
res2: ^Professor Jackson feels e learn best by being out in the world so the first day we are to just go wander the campus and ponder some things.

^At first this felt like a free period and I was so happy to just be able to wander around outside but then I realized the point was to really ponder some critical questions in life and I really become enlightened. This might've been the best class I ever had. And I wasn't even in a class!
